name: send_a_welcome_email_to_new_user_of_an_application
title: Send a welcome email to new user of an application
description: A welcome email is the first impression that an organization makes on a new customer or employee. Welcome emails can deliver a special promotion code, provide information to enhance the user experience, or just send a friendly hello. This template demonstrates how a welcome email can be sent automatically to a new user.

flos.name: Send welcome email to Okta Workflow users
